title: League of Legends Child Education Program
body:
Your last played champion or champions you own are now part of a program made to educate children on t.v.

How do they teach kids?

(Think of it as putting them on Nick Jr.)

replies.body:
{{champion:114}} 
Slap em on da butt with a ruler.

Or champions I own? I think this is all of them, (some of them are on another account,) But I'm not sure. . .I've collected a few here and there.

{{champion:34}} : "Now remember children! Freezing yourself in a blizzard will ensure your survival for thousands of years!"
{{champion:1}} : "Playing with fire is fun!"
{{champion:22}} : "Work together and you will stand triumphant."
{{champion:268}} : "**SHURIMA!** Also give me that sandbox!"
{{champion:432}} : *Makes several horn sounds and floats about*
{{champion:51}} : "Remember kids, always aim for the apple!" *Gunshot sounds*
{{champion:31}} : "Remember children. . .it is I who lurks beneath your beds!" *demonic laughter*
{{champion:41}} : "A good few pints will wash all ya worries away! YAAARG!"
{{champion:86}} : "Truth! **JUSTICE!!** and the Demacian way!"
{{champion:104}} : "And this is why you don't cheat kids. . ." *Shotgun blast*
{{champion:39}} : "Balance is key."
{{champion:222}} : "It's fun to play with guns! Come on kids! Let's go have us a blast!"
{{champion:429}} : "Ever had someone steal one of your toys? Just let me know and vengeance shall be yours. . ."
{{champion:55}} : "Yeah I don't teach kids."
{{champion:10}} : "Order must prevail over all. . .or you're going to hell. Trust me I'm an angel."
{{champion:121}} : "It's time to play hide and go eat- uh, I mean go seek out in the woods kids!"
{{champion:96}} : "SOOoo hungry. . . ."
{{champion:89}} : "Praise the sun! The sun and all its glory!"
{{champion:117}} : "Isn't this a fun game?" *No one understands that the cute little squeaks and chirps coming from the animals are actually transformed children screaming in pure terror.*
{{champion:99}} : "A double rainbow? What does it mean? Well, a rainbow is an abstract-" *Everyone is falling asleep from boredom.*
{{champion:90}} : "Look into the void!" *Show gets canceled after reports start coming in of children dying after staring into his eyes for too long on the TV screen.*
{{champion:80}} : "I'll teach you the ways of war!" *The next generation is thoroughly instructed on the art of war and become highly skilled tacticians by the age of ten.*
{{champion:421}} : "tch tktktk! SCREEEEEEEAAAA!!!" *No one is sure exactly what the show is.*
{{champion:58}} : "I'll rend your flesh!"
{{champion:92}} : "How to reforge your runeblade in the heat of combat!"
{{champion:13}} : "No. Just no."
{{champion:98}} : "Balance in all things. . .No I am not Sub Zero!"
{{champion:102}} : "Boxing 101! Ignite you hands in fire strong enough to melt steal! Then tear into your opponent as if they just murdered you father right in front of you!" *Children start crying.*
{{champion:14}} : "**COOOWAAARDS!!**
{{champion:15}} : "How being a sellsword can benefit you!"
{{champion:37}} : ". . . . ." *plays musical beats and quickly draws in the ratings. No one is sure if it's the music or her boobs though. . .*
{{champion:16}} : "Let me heal you!" *Plays in a kid's hospital type show.*
{{champion:91}} : "Now where did I leave that blade?" *Hit TV show similar to blue's clues, where you have to help him find the blade he has lost, and often the person he has lost it in. . .*
{{champion:17}} : "Follow the scouts code!" *Gets canceled after an episode where Teemo show children how to find mushroom out and the wild and hundreds of kids die from poisoning.*
{{champion:18}} "Is that a rocket in you pocket?" *Due to her cute appearance and bouncy movements, she quickly becomes a child icon and sells merchandise like crazy. Mother however don't like her because of a certain catch phrase of hers that their children love repeating.*
{{champion:6}} : *Quickly gets canceled as no one can watch it without throwing up.*
{{champion:67}} : *Gets canceled after a few episodes after DC Comics sues the show for copyright infringements.*
{{champion:45}} : "I'll show you evil!" *Becomes a beloved villain in a child's cartoon where even adults love to wear T-shirts with him on them.*
{{champion:8}} : *Gets pulled off air after failing to meat the rating standards for a children's show.*
{{champion:19}} : *Get's confused with a werewolf show.*
{{champion:154}} : "I would look good in a suit." *Becomes popular do to his personality and bounciness.*
{{champion:238}} : *Gets canceled after the show is sued for ripping off Shredder from TMNT.*
{{champion:143}} : *Teaches children how to care for plants and grow their gardens. However also does a second **LATENIGHT** show for adults only selling victoria's secret underwear and certain other products.*

Well I think that's most of them.
{{champion:36}}  MUNDO SAY ABC'S: Always Be Cleavin'
{{champion:20}}  Doesn't he already have a Sesame Street skin for this?

{{champion:21}} "Watch your mouth kid, or you'll find yourself respawning at home!"

Actual champ quote, and it works!
{{champion:115}} Remember kids, anarchy is bad... But really fun!
{{champion:35}} remember two shivs are better than one
{{champion:98}}: He would do it like Dora "A demonstration of Superior judgment"
{{champion:31}}  Now kids, it is time to learn about the nutritional qualities of the various champions of the league of legends.
